EzyRent Privacy Notice

At EzyRent, your privacy is a top priority. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our platform, including the EzyRent website and mobile application.
By using EzyRent, you agree to the terms outlined in this Privacy Policy.

Information We Collect

We may collect the following personal information:

  • Name, email address, phone number, and address.
  • Payment details (processed through secure third-party payment gateways).
  • Identification documents for verification purposes (e.g., government-issued ID).

We may collect non-personal data, such as:

  • Browser type and device information.
  • IP address and location data.
  • Usage statistics (e.g., pages visited, time spent on the platform).

We use cookies to enhance your experience. These include:

  • Essential Cookies: Required for platform functionality.
  • Performance Cookies: Track usage metrics to improve services.
  • Marketing Cookies: Deliver targeted ads.

You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings.

How We Use Your Information

We use your information to:

  • Provide and maintain our services (e.g., enabling property listings, bookings).
  • Verify user accounts and prevent fraud.
  • Process payments securely.
  • Improve platform functionality and user experience.
  • Send updates, promotions, and marketing communications.
  • Comply with legal obligations.

Sharing Your Information

We do not sell or rent your personal information. However, we may share it with:

  • Service Providers: Payment processors, verification services, and analytics providers who assist us in delivering services.
  • Legal Compliance: Authorities when required to comply with laws or enforce platform terms.
  • Business Transfers: In case of a merger, acquisition, or asset sale, your data may be transferred to the new entity.

Data Retention

We retain your personal data only for as long as necessary to:

  • Fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy.
  • Comply with legal and regulatory requirements.

If you wish to delete your account or request data deletion, contact us at support@ezrent.ng.

Data Protection and Security

We implement robust measures to protect your data, including:

  • SSL encryption for data transmission.
  • Secure storage systems.
  • Regular security audits and updates.

While we take every precaution, no online platform can guarantee complete security. Please use the platform responsibly.

Your Rights

You have the following rights concerning your data:

  • Access: Request access to your personal data.
  • Correction: Update or correct inaccuracies.
  • Deletion: Request data deletion (subject to legal obligations).
  • Objection: Opt-out of certain data processing activities, including marketing communications.

To exercise these rights, contact us at support@ezrent.ng.

Third-Party Links

Our platform may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for their privacy practices. Please review their privacy policies before sharing your information.

International Data Transfers

If you use EzyRent from outside Nigeria, your data may be transferred to and processed in Nigeria or other countries where our servers are located. By using the platform, you consent to such transfers.

Updates to this Privacy Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Changes will be posted on this page with the updated date. Please review this page periodically to stay informed.

Contact Us

If you have questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:

  • Email: support@ezrent.ng
  • Phone: +234 [8127-518-838]
  • Address: Akoka, Yaba, Lagos, Nigeria
